forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: area locking

comments.text: you can lock (ban) a person from your area for a time you specify. just click the area button on the main dialog (the mountain icon) and press the door.

thread.latestCommentText: you can lock (ban) a person from your area for a time you specify. just click the area button on the main dialog (the mountain icon) and press the door.
